## JsonEditor.clone() method

Deep clones a supplied JSON value, applying all editor rules and a default or optionally supplied context

**Signature:**

```typescript
clone(src: JsonValue, context?: IJsonContext): DetailedResult<JsonValue, JsonEditFailureReason>;
```
